verses.text: Lajan in icha junok anh xumac t'a sch'olanil yic Sarón, icha anh chochol sq'uib' t'a ak'lic, xchi ix. Syalan winh quelem:
D'a skal heb' ix yetixal ix xajanab'il wuuj, lajan ix icha junok anh xumac t'a skal te' q'uiix, xchi winh. Syalan ix cob'es:
D'a skal heb' yetquelemal winh xajanab'il wuuj, lajan winh icha junok te' mansan ay t'a kaltac te'. Manh jantacoc swach'il wem k'ojan t'a yenhul, te chi' sat te' swab'i.
Ix in yik'b'at winh t'a spatil niwac wael, t'a smasanil sk'ol winh ix sch'oxo' to xajan in yuj.
Ak' te' taquinh sat uwa t'ayin yic tz'och wip, a wal te' mansan tzak' in lo yic sicb'i in k'ool, yujto tzin cham ach in nib'ani.
Ha sk'ab' winh t'a sk'exanh syak'och t'a yalanh in jolom, haxo swach' winh tzin lak'ank'ei, xchi ix. Syalan winh quelem:
Ex cob'estac aj Jerusalén, tzin tewi wal t'ayex to manh he pitzel swayanh ix xajanab'il wuuj, munil ol el swayanh ix, xchi winh. Syalan ix cob'es:
A... wan sjawi winh xajanab'il wuuj. Tzaxo wab' yoch sjaj winh. Sk'e wal chennaj winh scot t'a jolomtac witz. Sk'e wal chennaj winh sjawi t'a tzalquixtac.
Ha winh xajanab'il wuuj, lajan winh icha nok' ch'ucul, icha wal junok yune' ch'ucul chi'. Ayxoek' winh t'a patic pat tik, t'anhanxooch winh t'a yolanil wentena.
Ha winh xajanab'il wuuj chi', ix yal winh t'ayin icha tik: Q'ueanh waan ach xajanab'il wuuj, cotanh ach nib'ab'il wuuj.
Inai, toxo ix ek'b'at sk'ual sicnhab'.
Ayxo anh xumac t'a kaltac te', toxo ix k'och stiempoal yoch b'it, tzaxo kab' yoch sjaj nok' cuwajte' t'a tik.
Ayxo sat te' higo, sumumi yel sjab' te' uwa. Q'ueanh waan ach xajanab'il wuuj, ach to te wach' ilji, cotanh, xchi winh t'ayin, xchi ix. Syalan winh quelem:
Ach xajanab'il wuuj, lajan ach icha nok' paramuch sk'ub'ej sb'ha t'a sattac k'een. Ch'ox a sat wila'', lolonanh jab'oc wab'i, yujto te wach'tzin a loloni, te wach'pax ilji.
Pechec nok' waax yet' nok' yune', to syixtej te' cuwa nok', icha te' wanto yak'an xumaquil, xchi winh. Syalan ix cob'es:
Yic in winh xajanab'il wuuj, wik pax winh, stanhwi kalnel winh t'a skal anh xumac.

Yacb'an manta ik' t'a q'uinhib'alil, ayic manto sakb'i, meltzajanhcot t'ayin ach xajanab'il wuuj. Lajan tzutej a b'a icha junok nok' ch'ucul, icha nok' quelem ch'ucul toxonhej sk'e chennaj scot t'a tzalquixtac, xchi ix.
